key_title: Key to the varieties of Caesia parviflora

Key to the species of Caesia

source.author: Conran, J.G.
source.title: Liliaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons
source.citation: Modified from: Conran, J.G. (1994). Liliaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Flowers white to blue, segments to 8.5 mm long; widest leaves mostly more than 2 mm wide; plant usually more than 20 cm tall
Flowers white, segments less than 5 mm long; leaves to c. 2 mm wide; plant usually less than 20 cm tall; roots fleshy-fibrous
Flowers white or pale blue to pink; staminal filaments greenish white; leaves to 5 mm wide; roots fleshy-fibrous
Flowers dark blue with darker venation; staminal filaments blue, often with transverse white bands; leaves to 8 mm wide; roots with fusiform tubers
